mapper.sql: r.id, r.user_id, r.borrow_id, r.status, r.`ORDER`, r.webstatus, r.repayment_time, r.repayment_yestime, r.repayment_account, r.repayment_yesaccount, CASE WHEN r.status = 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d'),CURDATE()) > 0 THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d'),CURDATE()) ELSE r.LATE_DAYS END LATE_DAYS, CASE WHEN r.status = 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d'),CURDATE()) > 0 THEN round(r.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT*0.002*TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d'),CURDATE()),2) ELSE r.LATE_INTEREST END LATE_INTEREST, r.interest, r.capital, r.advancetime
mapper.select: select b.`NAME` borrow_name, b.`STATUS` borrow_status, b.style style, b.TIME_LIMIT timeLimit, b.BORROWTYPE borrowType, m.username, , (SELECT SUM(c.CAPITAL) FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.IS_FIRST_BORROW = 1 AND c.BORROW_ID = b.id AND c.`ORDER` = r.`ORDER`) first_account from rocky_b_repaymentrecord r,rocky_borrow b, rocky_member m where r.BORROW_ID = b.id and b.BORROWTYPE in(1, 2, 5) and b.USER_ID = m.id and ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTR(NOW() FROM 1 FOR 10),' 00:00:00')) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.repayment_time) FROM 1 FOR 10),' 00:00:00')) and r.`STATUS` = 0) or (r.`STATUS` = 1 AND (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.repayment_yestime) FROM 1 FOR 10),' 00:00:00')) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.repayment_time) FROM 1 FOR 10),' 00:00:00'))))) ORDER BY r.status asc, r.webstatus asc, r.REPAYMENT_TIME asc

select count(r.id) from rocky_b_repaymentrecord r,rocky_borrow b where r.BORROW_ID = b.id and b.BORROWTYPE in(1, 2, 5) and ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTR(NOW() FROM 1 FOR 10),' 00:00:00')) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.repayment_time) FROM 1 FOR 10),' 00:00:00')) and r.`STATUS` = 0) or (r.`STATUS` = 1 AND (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.repayment_yestime) FROM 1 FOR 10),' 00:00:00')) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.repayment_time) FROM 1 FOR 10),' 00:00:00')))))

SELECT m.USERNAME,b.`NAME` borrow_name, b.`STATUS` borrow_status, b.STYLE style, b.TIME_LIMIT timeLimit, b.BORROWTYPE borrowType,, (SELECT SUM(c.CAPITAL) FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.IS_FIRST_BORROW = 1 AND c.BORROW_ID = b.id AND c.`ORDER` = r.`ORDER`) first_account FROM ( SELECT t.max_id,t.USER_ID FROM ( SELECT r.id max_id,t.USER_ID,t.STATUS1,t.STATUS0,t.REPAYMENT_YESTIME FROM ( SELECT MAX(r.`STATUS`) AS STATUS1, MIN(r.`STATUS`) AS STATUS0,MAX(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME) AS REPAYMENT_YESTIME,r.USER_ID FROM rocky_borrow b, rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE r.`STATUS` IN (0, 1) AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) GROUP BY b.USER_ID ) t LEFT JOIN rocky_b_repaymentrecord r on(t.USER_ID = r.USER_ID and t.REPAYMENT_YESTIME = r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME) ) t WHERE t.STATUS1 = 1 AND STATUS0 = 1 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(t.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 DAY) ) tt,rocky_member m,rocky_borrow b,rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE tt.USER_ID = m.ID AND tt.max_id = r.id AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID ORDER BY r.repayment_yestime desc

SELECT count(t.max_id) FROM ( SELECT max(r.id) max_id,b.USER_ID, MAX(r.`STATUS`) AS STATUS1, MIN(r.`STATUS`) AS STATUS0, MAX(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME) AS REPAYMENT_YESTIME FROM rocky_borrow b, rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE r.`STATUS` IN (0, 1) AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) GROUP BY b.USER_ID ) t WHERE t.STATUS1 = 1 AND STATUS0 = 1 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(t.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 DAY)

SELECT ROUND(SUM(d.COLLECTION)/10000,2) AS account FROM rocky_account_day_log d WHERE d.addtime >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 29 DAY) AND d.addtime < CURDATE() GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.addtime,'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT ROUND(SUM(account)/10000,0) AS account FROM rocky_borrow b WHERE b.STATUS IN (4, 5, 42) AND b.SUCCESS_TIME <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())

select count(DISTINCT t.userId) from ( select rbt.user_id as userId FROM rocky_borrow b,rocky_b_tenderrecord rbt WHERE 1=1 and rbt.user_ID<100000000 AND b.ID=rbt.BORROW_ID AND b.STATUS IN (4, 5, 42) AND b.SUCCESS_TIME <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) UNION ALL select tftd.user_id as userId FROM t_fix_borrow fb,t_fix_tender_detail tftd WHERE 1=1 AND fb.ID=tftd.FIX_BORROW_ID AND fb.SUCCESS_TIME <= NOW() ) t
SELECT ROUND(SUM(r.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT), 2) AS account FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE r.STATUS =0 and r.WEBSTATUS=0 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE != 4
SELECT t.BORROWTYPE AS borrowtype,ROUND(SUM(ACCOUNT),2) AS account FROM rocky_borrow t WHERE (t.STATUS = 4 or t.STATUS = 5 or t.STATUS = 42) GROUP BY t.BORROWTYPE

SELECT b.BORROWTYPE AS borrowtype, ROUND(SUM(r.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT), 2) AS account FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE r.STATUS = 0 and r.WEBSTATUS=0 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE != 4 GROUP BY b.BORROWTYPE

SELECT ROUND(SUM(r.REPAYMENT_YESACCOUNT),2) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r,rocky_borrow b WHERE 1=1 AND r.STATUS = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d')<=FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT ROUND(SUM(r.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT),2) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) AND IF(r.status = 1,(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')),(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')))

SELECT ROUND(SUM(r.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT),2) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r,rocky_borrow b WHERE 1=1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) AND r.STATUS = 1 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d')>FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT ROUND(SUM(r.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT),2) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) AND r.STATUS = 0 AND IF(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')) > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT SUM(c.INTEREST) FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c,rocky_b_tenderrecord t,rocky_borrow b WHERE 1=1 AND c.TENDER_ID = t.ID AND t.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(user_id)) FROM rocky_borrow b WHERE 1=1 AND (b.STATUS = 4 OR b.STATUS = 5 OR b.STATUS = 42) AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT b.USER_ID, MAX(r.`STATUS`) AS STATUS1, MIN(r.`STATUS`) AS STATUS0, Max(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME) AS REPAYMENT_YESTIME FROM rocky_borrow b, rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE r.`STATUS` IN (0, 1) AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,5) GROUP BY b.USER_ID ) t WHERE t.STATUS1 = 1 AND STATUS0 = 1 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(t.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 DAY)
SELECT ID AS id, CALC_DATE AS calcDate, BORROW_MONEY AS borrowMoney, WAIT_RECEIVE_MONEY AS waitReceiveMoney, INVEST_PERSONS AS investPersons FROM t_finance_chart

select (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE `STATUS` IN (4, 5, 42) AND BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4)) as transactionAmount, (select COUNT(1) from rocky_borrow where STATUS in(4,5,42) AND BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4)) as transactionNumber, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(user_id)) FROM rocky_borrow b WHERE 1=1 AND (b.STATUS = 4 OR b.STATUS = 5 OR b.STATUS = 42) AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) ) as borrowersNumber, (select count(DISTINCT t.userId) from ( select t.user_id as userId from rocky_b_tenderrecord t,rocky_borrow b where b.id=t.BORROW_ID and b.status in(4,5,42) AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) and t.user_id<100000000 UNION ALL select tftd.user_id as userId from t_fix_tender_detail tftd where tftd.`STATUS` in(1,3) UNION ALL select ftd.user_id as userId from t_first_tender_detail ftd where ftd.STATUS in(1) ) t) as investorsNumber, (select round(t1.TOTALMONEY/t2.borrowCount,2) from (SELECT ROUND(SUM(ACCOUNT), 2) AS TOTALMONEY FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE `STATUS` IN (4, 5, 42) AND BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4)) t1, (select IFNULL(sum(t.accountCount),0) as borrowCount from ( select count(1) as accountCount from rocky_b_tenderrecord t,rocky_borrow b where b.id=t.BORROW_ID and b.status in(4,5,42) AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) and t.status in(1,2) and t.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID is null and t.USER_ID<100000000 UNION ALL select count(1) as accountCount from t_fix_tender_detail tftd where tftd.`STATUS` in(1,3) UNION ALL select count(1) as accountCount from t_first_tender_detail ftd where ftd.STATUS in(1) UNION ALL select count(1) as accountCount from t_first_subscribe tfs where tfs.STATUS in(3) ) t ) t2) as investmentAverageAmount, (select IFNULL(round(sum(CAPITAL),2),0) from rocky_b_repaymentrecord where STATUS=0) as loanBalance, (select IFNULL(round(t1.totalAcount*100/t2.totalMoney,2),0) from (select sum(t4.repayTotal) as totalAcount from rocky_member rm INNER JOIN ( select * from ( select rbr.user_id,SUM(rbr.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT) as repayTotal from rocky_b_repaymentrecord rbr INNER JOIN rocky_borrow rb on rbr.BORROW_ID=rb.id where rbr.STATUS=0 and rb.BORROWTYPE in(1,2) group by rbr.user_id) t order by repayTotal DESC limit 1 ) t4 on rm.id=t4.USER_ID INNER JOIN rocky_realname_appro rra on rm.id=rra.user_id) t1, (select sum(t4.repayTotal) as totalMoney from rocky_member rm INNER JOIN ( select * from (select rbr.user_id,SUM(rbr.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT) as repayTotal from rocky_b_repaymentrecord rbr INNER JOIN rocky_borrow rb on rbr.BORROW_ID=rb.id where rbr.STATUS=0 and rb.BORROWTYPE in(1,2) group by rbr.user_id) t ) t4 on rm.id=t4.USER_ID INNER JOIN rocky_realname_appro rra on rm.id=rra.user_id ) t2) as largestAccounted, (select IFNULL(round(t1.totalAcount*100/t2.totalMoney,2),0) from (select sum(t4.repayTotal) as totalAcount from rocky_member rm INNER JOIN ( select * from ( select rbr.user_id,SUM(rbr.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT) as repayTotal from rocky_b_repaymentrecord rbr INNER JOIN rocky_borrow rb on rbr.BORROW_ID=rb.id where rbr.STATUS=0 and rb.BORROWTYPE in(1,2) group by rbr.user_id) t order by repayTotal DESC limit 10 ) t4 on rm.id=t4.USER_ID INNER JOIN rocky_realname_appro rra on rm.id=rra.user_id) t1, (select sum(t4.repayTotal) as totalMoney from rocky_member rm INNER JOIN ( select * from (select rbr.user_id,SUM(rbr.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT) as repayTotal from rocky_b_repaymentrecord rbr INNER JOIN rocky_borrow rb on rbr.BORROW_ID=rb.id where rbr.STATUS=0 and rb.BORROWTYPE in(1,2) group by rbr.user_id) t ) t4 on rm.id=t4.USER_ID INNER JOIN rocky_realname_appro rra on rm.id=rra.user_id ) t2) as tenlargestAccounted, (select round((t1.sucessTime/t2.borrowCount),0) from (SELECT SUM(SUCCESS_TIME-PUBLISH_TIME) as sucessTime FROM `rocky_borrow` where `STATUS` IN (4, 5, 42) AND BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) ) t1, (select COUNT(1) as borrowCount from rocky_borrow where STATUS in(4,5,42) AND BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) ) t2) as meanFullTime, (select round(t1.lateCount*100/t2.borrowCount,2) from (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.BORROW_ID) as lateCount FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.`STATUS` IN (4, 5, 42) AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) AND IF(r.status = 1,(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')),(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')))) t1, (select COUNT(1) as borrowCount from rocky_borrow where STATUS in(4,5,42) AND BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) ) t2) as cumulativeRate, (select round(t1.lateCount*100/t2.borrowCount,2) from (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.BORROW_ID) as lateCount FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.`STATUS` IN (4, 5, 42) AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) AND IF(r.status = 1,(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')),(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'))) AND IF(r.status = 1,r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME> DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 90 DAY) and r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME<UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()),r.REPAYMENT_TIME> DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 90 DAY) and r.REPAYMENT_TIME<UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())) ) t1, (select COUNT(1) as borrowCount from rocky_borrow where STATUS in(4,5,42) AND BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) ) t2) as platformProjectThreeRate, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(r.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT),2),0) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.`STATUS` IN (4, 5, 42) AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) AND IF(r.status = 1,(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')),(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')))) as borrowingAmount, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(r.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT),2),0) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.`STATUS` IN (4, 5, 42) AND b.BORROWTYPE IN(1,2,3,4) AND r.STATUS = 0 AND IF(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')) > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')) as compensatoryAmount from dual;
